Karass

Settings

Types

Contact #g-content if you'd like to edit this list.

Internal message
Any message for widely distributed internal consumption, such as Slack messages (#news), internal emails, and all-hands announcements. Not published to the public.
Internal documentation about how we work
An article for internal consumption, shared with all new hires and used as reference by staff (also shared publicly whenever possible). Published at handbook.18f.gov.
Guide
A long-form (> 1,000 words), public collection of information in a simple, standard style. Published at pages.18f.gov/ and linked from guides.18f.gov.
Blog posts
A public article about how we work and what weâ€™re up to. Published at 18f.gsa.gov/blog.
Misc. web content
18F occasionally publishes microsites outside of our standard guide format (pages.18f.gov/). We’ll work with you to publish content on any relevant subdomain.

Topics

Add new

Topics we want to be sensitive to as people create content:

  • A specific law, regulation, or member of Congress. Edit
  • A particular agency Edit
  • Research or best practices relevant to an 18F grouplet Edit
  • 18F’s relationships with vendors Edit
  • A previously unreleased website Edit
  • The Agile BPA Edit
  • An 18F project, product, or initiative (other than Agile BPA) Edit
  • Laws or regulations that govern GSA or federal employees Edit
